results.title: Tallinn Startup Founder 101 - Meetup
results.content: Startup Founder 101 brings together aspiring and experienced tech entrepreneurs to discuss, meet, and collaborate to build great new startups.
results.raw_content:
![](https://www.facebook.com/tr?id=792405807634160&ev=PageView&noscript=1)
![Tallinn Startup Founder 101 cover photo](https://secure.meetupstatic.com/photos/event/d/a/b/a/clean_468475994.webp)

# Tallinn Startup Founder 101

[2,368 members](https://www.meetup.com/tallinn-startup-founder-101/members/) ¬∑ Public group

![sparkle icon](https://secure.meetupstatic.com/next/images/complex-icons/branded/sparkle.webp?w=64)
![calendar icon](https://secure.meetupstatic.com/next/images/complex-icons/branded/calendar.webp?w=64)
![people2 icon](https://secure.meetupstatic.com/next/images/complex-icons/branded/people-2.webp?w=64)
![photo icon](https://secure.meetupstatic.com/next/images/complex-icons/branded/photo.webp?w=64)
![chat icon](https://secure.meetupstatic.com/next/images/complex-icons/branded/chat.webp?w=64)

## What we‚Äôre about

Startup Founder 101 brings together aspiring and experienced tech entrepreneurs to discuss, meet, and collaborate to build great new startups, and to push the local startup ecosystem forward.  
  
  
  
This group hosts numerous free events throughout the year where you can learn the best practices of starting a company from people who have been there and done that. You‚Äôll have the opportunity to meet local founders and investors, exchange ideas with experts, get feedback on your idea, participate in startup workshops, and more.  
  
  
  
Typical startup event topics include:  
  
‚Ä¢ Coming up with a strong startup idea  
  
‚Ä¢ Startup legal basics  
  
‚Ä¢ How to pitch your startup  
  
‚Ä¢ Starting a company without quitting your day job  
  
‚Ä¢ How to raise funding for your startup  
  
‚Ä¢ And much more!  
  
  
  
Join the group to be invited to our next event!

## Upcoming events

3

![How to Build Your 2026 Startup Operations Plan](https://secure.meetupstatic.com/photos/event/6/2/b/1/highres_531385265.jpeg)

### How to Build Your 2026 Startup Operations Plan

The end of the year is your chance to set your startup up for a successful 2026. **Join Adam Spector, Founder and CEO of Chore, for an exclusive, no-nonsense session where he'll guide you through an actionable, 100-item checklist covering compliance, payroll, taxes, contractor payments, and more. This isn't just about checking boxes‚Äîit's about positioning your startup for streamlined operations and fewer headaches in the new year.** With Adam's extensive experience as a 4x founder and +200 investor, he'll show you how Chore helps startups like yours offload back-office tasks, allowing you to focus on growth.  
  
**‚ùØ What You'll Learn:**

**‚ùØ Featured Speaker:**

**Additional Resources:**  
Find more [Startup Events](https://fi.co/events), learn about the [Entrepreneur DNA test](https://dna.fi.co/) or sign up for the [Insights Newsletter](https://fi.co/subscribe) to get the latest startup tips and trends.  
  
**‚ùØ‚ùØ This live, interactive online event promises valuable insights! Ensure your participation by RSVPing now at üëâ https://fi.co/startupwebinar/21089 to receive the link to join us live!**

![Photo of the user ](https://secure.meetupstatic.com/photos/member/a/a/b/1/thumb_315283697.jpeg?w=48)
![Photo of the user ](https://secure.meetupstatic.com/photos/member/c/7/e/4/thumb_288231172.jpeg?w=48)
![Startup Ideation Bootcamp: Info Session w/ Jonathan Greechan (CEO, FI)](https://secure.meetupstatic.com/photos/event/6/b/3/f/highres_531507455.jpeg)

### Startup Ideation Bootcamp: Info Session w/ Jonathan Greechan (CEO, FI)

Getting your startup idea off the ground starts with strong ideation, customer validation, and pitching skills - supercharged with AI tools and agents. **At this live online event, Jonathan Greechan, CEO & Co-Founder at Founder Institute, will outline how the Startup Ideation Bootcamp can help you develop your idea, validate it with mentors, and practice your pitch in a supportive environment.** Attendees will learn what to expect from the bootcamp and how to make the most of the mentorship and feedback opportunities. If you're ready to take your startup idea to the next level, don't miss this info session.  
  
**‚ùØ Who Should Attend?**

**‚ùØ What to Expect:**

**‚ùØ Featured Speaker:**

**‚ùØ‚ùØ This live, interactive online event promises valuable insights! Ensure your participation by RSVPing now at üëâ https://fi.co/e/383559/meetup to receive the link to join us live!**

![Photo of the user ](https://secure.meetupstatic.com/photos/member/a/a/b/1/thumb_315283697.jpeg?w=48)
![Photo of the user ](https://secure.meetupstatic.com/photos/member/f/b/4/thumb_320884020.jpeg?w=48)
![Photo of the user ](https://secure.meetupstatic.com/photos/member/d/1/4/c/thumb_313193580.jpeg?w=48)
![Founder Showcase: Startup Pitch & Networking Event, with Jenny Fielding](https://secure.meetupstatic.com/photos/event/d/b/9/2/highres_531296210.jpeg)

### Founder Showcase: Startup Pitch & Networking Event, with Jenny Fielding

**The Founder Showcase is Silicon Valley's leading international startup pitch event, helping pre-seed startups learn, launch, and connect with investors.** At this interactive online event, you can watch the pitches of promising pre-seed startups from across the globe. We'll also have an inspiring keynote presentation from **Jenny Fielding, Co-Founder and Managing Partner at Everywhere Ventures**, where she shares insights into the evolving startup funding landscape, her book Venture Everywhere, how to build a startup in the age of AI, and more. Stay after the pitches to network with international founders, investors, and executives.  
  
**‚ùØ‚ùØ For complete event and speaker details, visit üëâ <https://fi.co/startupwebinar/20979>**

.  
**‚ùØ About the Founder Showcase:**  
The Founder Showcase is Silicon Valley's leading international startup pitch event, helping seed-stage startups learn, launch, and connect to investors. Since 2008, speakers like Elon Musk and startups like Udemy and Thumbtack have presented on our stage. Learn more about this premier event at [FounderShowcase](http://foundershowcase.com/).  
.  
**‚ùØ‚ùØ Don‚Äôt miss this live, interactive online event packed with valuable insights! RSVP now at üëâ <https://fi.co/startupwebinar/20979>**

results.title: LIFT99
results.content: **Welcome to LIFT99**OUR MISSION IS TO CREATE STARTUP SUCCESS STORIES AND HELP FOUNDERS CHANGE THE WORLD LIFT99 Tallinn Hub is our first space. Since 2016, LIFT99 Tallinn Hub is the flagship of Estonian vibrant startup community & the go-to place for founders. LIFT99 Kyiv Hub is our second location in CEE - it‚Äôs Kyiv's hottest startup community, and it‚Äôs mission is to help Ukraine to the global startup map. We organize and host events that align with our vision, offer real value for the community, help to make crucial connections, and support startups on their global growth. We have seen several successful stories of startups who joined our community in early stage.
results.raw_content:
**Welcome to LIFT99**OUR MISSION IS TO CREATE STARTUP SUCCESS STORIES AND HELP FOUNDERS CHANGE THE WORLD

Join a community of fast-growing tech startups, software-driven companies, and exponential growth scale-ups aiming for global expansion. The companies and entrepreneurs at LIFT99 are open and encouraged to help each other grow.

# 40+

startups in community

# 700+

hosted events

# 250

tours and counting

# 10K+

visitors in a year

# Here‚Äôs what you need

A membership or one-off reservation at LIFT99 gives you a lot more than just office space.

LIFT99 Tallinn Hub is our first space. Since 2016, LIFT99 Tallinn Hub is the flagship of Estonian vibrant startup community & the go-to place for founders.

LIFT99 Kyiv Hub is our second location in CEE - it‚Äôs Kyiv's hottest startup community, and it‚Äôs mission is to help Ukraine to the global startup map.

A community-first network of startup founders, freelancers, nomads, and other creatives who are passionate about making an impact. LIFT99 connects founders from Silicon Valley to Eastern Europe and back.

Planning your next team meeting? Whether you‚Äôre a group of 2 or 20 ‚Äì we‚Äôve got a conference room with your name on it. Check out [Tallinn Hub](/tallinn-hub) and [Kyiv Hub](/kyiv-hub) for pricing.

We organize and host events that align with our vision, offer real value for the community, help to make crucial connections, and support startups on their global growth. Check out what's coming up in [LIFT99 Tallinn Hub](https://www.facebook.com/LIFT99co/) and [LIFT99 Kyiv Hub](https://www.facebook.com/LIFT99KyivHub/).

# Why join LIFT99?

We love people. We love connecting people. We love likeminded people, who give their all in order to challenge the existing norms and never stop asking questions. We believe in synergy and co-growing. That‚Äôs the reason to make LIFT99 your second home.

We have seen several successful stories of startups who joined our community in early stage. They passionately developed their idea, got feedback from peer community members, learned from other founders‚Äô experience, raised their first investment rounds, and built their team until it was time to fly out from our Hub to reach higher levels.

[Learn more](/community) about Awesomic, Dashbird and Outfunnel‚Äôs stories.

# Life at the Hubs

[Margus J√µemaa (Finance Plus): Tackling Taxes Like a Puzzle - A Startup-Friendly Take on Tax Planning](/blog/finance-plus/taxes)

[Another Game-Changer on the Wall: Stargate Hydrogen](/blog/stargate-hydrogen-wall-of-fame)

[Small Beginnings, Big Dreams: The Journey of Spindl‚Äôs Founders](/blog/humans-of-lift99/spindl)

[Bisly Joins the #EstoniaMafia Wall of Fame!](/blog/bisly-wall-of-fame)

[Navigating Estonia‚Äôs Startup Landscape: Linda and Margus from Karma VC Reflect on 2024](/blog/navigating-estonias-investment-landscape-with-karma-vc)

results.title: Foreign Founders Meetup | Tehnopol Startup Inkubaator
results.content: Foreign Founders Meetup is a six-part event series created by Enterprise Estonia in cooperation with Tehnopol Startup Incubator to support foreign founders in
results.raw_content:
![](https://www.facebook.com/tr?id=199571747528720&ev=PageView&noscript=1)
![Tehnopol Startup Inkubaator](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==)
![Tehnopol Startup Inkubaator](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==)
![](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==)
![](https://www.startupincubator.ee/w/wp-content/themes/twentynineteen-child/images/icon-burger.svg)
![](https://www.startupincubator.ee/w/wp-content/themes/twentynineteen-child/images/icon-close.svg)
![](https://www.startupincubator.ee/w/wp-content/themes/twentynineteen-child/images/icon-search.svg)

# Foreign Founders Meetup

**Hey, foreign founder!** Building a startup in Estonia is exciting ‚Äì but sometimes also a little quirky. An investor might invite you to the sauna before they invite you to their office. Your first meeting could be almost silent, but the next day everyone‚Äôs already following you on LinkedIn. And when someone says *‚Äúlet‚Äôs see‚Äù*, it usually means *no* ‚Äì just delivered in the polite Estonian way.

**Foreign Founders Meetup** helps you make sense of local environment and understand the ‚Äúhappy introverts‚Äù ‚Äì Estonians ‚Äì while moving your startup forward. Each event gives you a hands-on workshop, an honest discussion, and plenty of networking opportunities. Step by step, the Estonian startup ecosystem will feel less mysterious and much more like your own.

### What is Foreign Founders Meetup?

Foreign Founders Meetup is a **six-part event series** created by Enterprise Estonia in cooperation with Tehnopol Startup Incubator¬†to support foreign founders in Estonia. By joining the Foreign Founders Meetup, you‚Äôll get:

practical knowledge on how to navigate Estonia‚Äôs business, legal, and tax environment,

direct access to experts, mentors, and investors,

a stronger network of peers and partners in Estonia,

the confidence and skills to grow faster and expand internationally.

The series runs from **October 2025 to March 2026**, with most meetups in Tallinn and one in Tartu. Alongside workshops and panel discussions, there‚Äôs extended networking time to help you find partners, team members, and investors.

### Who should join?

If you‚Äôre an international founder or an early team member in Estonia, this series is designed for you. It‚Äôs for anyone who wants to better understand the local business environment, build meaningful connections, develop practical skills, and prepare for international growth.

### Format

Each of the six meetups lasts up to **4 hours** and follows the same structure:

**Workshop (45‚Äì60 min)** ‚Äì practical insights and tools.

**Panel discussion (30 min)** ‚Äì diverse perspectives from locals and fellow founders.

**Networking (60‚Äì90 min)** ‚Äì meet new people, exchange ideas, and build connections.

Participation is FREE, but registration is required.

### Topics

Over six meetups, we‚Äôll dive into the topics that matter most to foreign founders in Estonia:

**Legal Landscape for Founders in Estonia** ‚Äì how to avoid legal pitfalls and build with confidence. Frist event on October 16, sign up **[here.](https://www.tehnopol.ee/en/events/foreign-founders-meetup-legal-landscape-for-founders-in-estonia-147914/)**

**Navigating Estonian Tax and Accounting ‚Äì** a practical overview of taxes and accounting. Happening on November 11, sign up **[here.](https://www.tehnopol.ee/en/events/foreign-founders-meetup-navigating-estonian-tax-and-accounting-152271/)**

**How to Find Your First Customers in Estonia** ‚Äì strategies for early customer acquisition. Happening on December 3, sign up **[here.](https://www.tehnopol.ee/en/events/foreign-founders-meetup-how-to-find-your-first-customers-in-estonia/)**

**What Investors Are Looking For in 2026** (sTARTUp Day side event in Tartu).

**Building Local Networks That Actually Work** ‚Äì how to develop meaningful relationships with local mentors and partners.

**Soft Skills & Resilience for Foreign Founders** ‚Äì leadership, balance, and resilience in a new cultural environment.

**Join the Foreign Founders Meetup and build the knowledge, contacts, and opportunities you need to grow your startup in Estonia!**

Co-funded by the European Regional Development Fund.

![](https://www.startupincubator.ee/w/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/Untitled-design-21.png)

![](https://www.startupincubator.ee/w/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/Untitled-design-21.png)
